mapper.update:
update catering_dish
dishes_id = #{dishesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
dish_name = #{dishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
in_stock = #{inStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where dish_id = #{dishId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update catering_dish set dishes_id = #{dishesId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dish_name = #{dishName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, in_stock = #{inStock,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, price = #{price,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, discount_price = #{discountPrice,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enabled = #{enabled,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dish_image = #{dishImage,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dish_image2 = #{dishImage2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dish_des = #{dishDes,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where dish_id = #{dishId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
SELECT dish_id dishId, dish_name dishName, dishes_name dishesName, in_stock inStock, price price, discount_price discountPrice, catering_dish.create_time createTime, catering_dish.modify_time modifyTime FROM catering_dish LEFT JOIN catering_dishes ON catering_dishes.dishes_id=catering_dish.dishes_id
AND dish_name=#{dishName}

SELECT dish_id dishId, dish_name dishName, price price, in_stock inStock, discount_price discountPrice, dish_des dishDes, dish_image dishImage, dish_image2 dishImage2 FROM catering_dish WHERE dish_id=#{dishId}
